page.title: 03TWO PEOPLE
page.content: The Rector comes from Gateshead in Tyne on Wear.The Rector has worked in the church for 13 years and has lived in Bulkington for 131\ years .The Rectors biggest worry is the people's uncaring attitude.It was not his ambition to join the church but he enjoys being a Rector and he enjoys his job.In his spare time the Rector likes walking and reading.He has been the Rector of many churches before {ST {JAMES CHURCH.}We interviewed{Mr {Dawkins }because he knows alot about Bulkington.He said that he would like to see a large village green as Bulkington has never had one.He would also like to see less roads in {Bulkington.}He likes watching football and cricket.He has worked in Nicholas Chamberlaine school and also George Street.He likes doing gardening.He is seventy years of age.
